column4: what the heck is wrong with ubuntu install cd, I boot the cd, select to install in the menu, it loads the kernel, then it outputs 2 lines and then the screen goes black; then after 1 min it is reading reads something from the CD for about 30 sec; then the CD is ejected, I reboot and my system is the same as it was before
check the CD for defects using the boot menu item
what did the defects check say?
